# Preamble

You can insert code with requirements at the begining in a hidden chunck.

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
```

# Inserting Images

The common way in Markdown

![](Fuchsia.jpg)

Here is a way to control more features of the image by using
`include_graphics()`.

```{r out.width="50%", fig.align='center', echo=FALSE}
include_graphics("Fuchsia.jpg")
```

# Inserting Tables

Insert tables from data frames using `kable()`.

```{r}
kable(iris[1:10, ])
```
